comment.author: 58613332@N00
comment._content: Thanks for sharing your picture. I'll be using it for my CSA Newsletter to accompany an article about  how pesticide use is dangerous for farm laborers. If you'd like an email copy of this Newsletter when it's ready for publication, please send an email to SqueakyChu@hotmail.com and refer to the picture of the farmer picking produce in the May 30, 2011, edition of our CSA Newsletter.
